website_summaries.verdict: Cricut aficionados swear by this lightweight, user-friendly machine, but graphic artists wanting more intricate designs may be frustrated by its limitations and software.
pros: Easy to hook up and begin cutting, and preset designs are fun for crafters
Bluetooth connectivity and included app for iPad make using the machine that much easier
Custom designs can be created with included DesignSpace software or by uploading an SVG file
cons: Can take time to learn in order to fully use its features
DesignSpace cloud software can be frustrating to use, and server connection is tenuous
Heavier cardstock drastically reduces the life of the cutting blade

customer_reviews.title: If you plan on vinyl shirts or sticks, forget it!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not do as promised. It is impossible to make your designs in the Cricut Design Space because there is no canvas option like before. This changed today and I feel like I've wasted my money on this machine. I called Cricut ands the company representatives I spoke with do not understand English so it is impossible to communicate with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: A fine piece of hardware, ruined by lousy software.
customer_reviews.text: Working with the cloud-based software was incredibly frustrating. You would think it would be a simple thing to cut some lines based on an SVG file, but the <expletive> software takes all control away from the user and moves shapes to wherever it darn well pleases. And then you think, it can't be that stupid, and you spend hours trying various workarounds and other filetypes and over and over again the software chooses to do it's own thing. Simply put, it can READ svg files, but it cannot RENDER svg files. Unless you intend to only cut the simplest of designs, avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: nappingbat

customer_reviews.title: Without internet connection, limited use.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that you had to get your operating software from the internet instead of off of your computer before you could use it. I live in a rural area with unstable and slow internet. Not much good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for Christmas on Amazon after 2 months of use it stopped working. The cricut stop being recognized by our computer. I even tried another computer and still didnt work. Called Amazon they only cover the product for 30 days so I was told to call Cricut which the customer service at Cricut is HORRIBLE. Finally called Amazon corporate and they gave me a refund. Cricut customer service is horrible and wait time is very long. I would not recommend this product no idea how it has a high rating.
customer_reviews.author: milton

customer_reviews.title: Love my cricut explore air
customer_reviews.text: Love my cricut explore air. was intimidated at first and held off on getting one but so glad i finally got it! It is super easy to figure out and I have been in my craft room everyday since receiving it! It has helped me to make stencils to paint signs, cards, scrapbook pieces, vinyl letters, and sooooo much more! Love it!!! I have so many ideas and the cricut helps me to make my ideas come to life!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Software is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This machine's software is all web based and terrible. My wife was given this machine by me as a gift for Christmas last year. As big of a headache as the web based software is, linking cartridges with it, and purchasing fonts and whatnot, I wish id never have bought it. If I could give it 0 stars I would. She's purchased, or rather attempted to purchase cartridges and the software always shows that she still has to purchase it and wont let her continue, multiple times. Her linked cartridges don't show up in their design space software, and you can't try to link them again. Overall a terrible product from a crap company.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my cricut
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my cricut. It is awesome and it actually came with more stuff than I thought it was going to!! I attached a photo of my first project! It came out perfect and I love the shirts. Great item and super happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Squires

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with limited success for a few months. Without spending a lot of extra money there is less to choose from. The customer service has been good, but I need to consult them constantly and I am pretty good with technology. I like the older, models better.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I read the reviews about how hard it is to use. I think it is so easy to set up and use. Within 15 minutes I had it set up on my PC, Macbook, and my ipad. I had no problems setting it up on my PC like some reviewers. I have already made 5 different Halloween cards and several tags. I thought that design space was very easy to use. I can't wait to make some more projects. I am also very happy that I got it for such a good price. It was on the daily deal. What a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: tar5

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Machine
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that when you get this you will likely not have a clue how to really use it and the general consensus seems to be that the best way to learn is by watching you tube videos. I concur. There is no booklet that comes with it, though you can download manuals online. However, they still don't really walk you through using it. Look for good you tube tutorials that explain the basics and you will be learning the use in no time. What the machine is capable of is impressive, and I've barely scratched the surface at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Guru

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE, this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. I had a P.O.S. Xyron Wishblade which has become obsolete and has ZERO technical support. I couldn't get the Xyron software to work anymore, it kept crashing and I tried EVERYTHING... even downloading another type of software that is supposed to run it on an iMac.... it failed and I got sick of trying to figure it out. So I chucked it and bought this. I haven't had a chance to use it much... but so far I absolute LOVE IT! The online software runs smoothly and easily and lets me make my own designs EASILY. WONDERFUL!! LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Saladin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love my Cricut. Sometimes it's a little frustrating because the Bluetooth doesn't stay connected or the mat slides in diagonally. But I think I'm getting the Hang of it. Cuts great. No white showing. I even decorated it using design studio!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Machine tour" on youtube and noticed that my Cricut did not include the "Start Here" folder nor did it include the Cricut Storag
customer_reviews.text: I received the Cricut Explore Air today. I have not used it yet as I have been watching tutorials all afternoon--I'll update my review once I've used the product. However, I will say that a couple things seemed to be missing. I was watching the "Cricut Explore Air: Machine tour" on youtube and noticed that my Cricut did not include the "Start Here" folder nor did it include the Cricut Storage bag which would have been very useful. Other than that, I seem to have all the appropriate accessories it is supposed to come with and the machine looks to be in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Krd1013

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Has the possibility of being wonderful. The templates have to be purchased separately or you need to pay for the monthly membership. The tutorials are not very clear and are fast for a new person. It really needs a class for learning to use it with real live instructors. The cards which I have been able to make come out beautifully. It cuts with precision! Unfortunately I have not made many due to the time it takes to figure it all out. I do not find it very user friendly. Maybe after another 50 videos I will understand it better. My older one is way easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: I can't stop using it!  So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this machine is amazing. After watching a few YouTube videos I started some Valentine's Day projects. I could not stop playing with my new toy! My grandchildren love the paper dolls we make keep lots of paper and glue in the house. The Cricut customer service dept is fantastic they are so helpful. I recommend the starter pack Amazon sells. It had everything needed to start projects right away. I look forward to future projects there are limitless ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with the quality of the product I received
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the quality of the product I received. I was able to complete only one or two small tasks. I spent a lot of money on supplies to make a fall wreath and some of the sheets did not get completely cut after several tries I just had to make due with what was cut out. I changed the blade and that did not help. I tried another project and i still can't get the program to make the product cut the entire sheet. I tried calibrating it and that didn't work. After a lot of money spent and even more frustration I have given up! It seems I got a product that is a Lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my cricut
customer_reviews.text: I love my cricut. The cricut circle is fairly easy to use. You can load all of your cartridges into your account so no need to pull all the cartridges and keyboard overlays out. It is nice to be able to cut and score or cut and write with the same cut vs realigning the machine and hoping it lines up right. You can download your own shames and images into it. So far no complaints. Easier to use then my old cricut and much quieter. I like that it comes with a varying bag but wish the cords fit in the bag better.
customer_reviews.author: JennJ

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best teachers aid EVER! Getting my classroom ready was a breeze with this! You name it, this machine can do it! Do NOT waste your money on earlier models, this one is FAR superior!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kim

customer_reviews.title: A great machine to be creative!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody looking for a cutting machine should go for the Cricut explore. The design of the machine itself is awesome, it is super easy to use and quite affordable. The product is as good as described on the description (if not better!). I have had hours of fun using it. I can only recommend it to anyone loving manual activities and scrapbooking, but also designers wanting to mock up some print projects needing cuttings.
customer_reviews.author: Liam A. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This machine does everything but the dishes! But you ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine does everything but the dishes! But you can make a sign for the dishwasher! The precision of the cuts and the ease of using your ipad or iphone. My wife figured it out without help from the home programmer
customer_reviews.author: Bible Family

customer_reviews.title: Love isn't a big enough word to describe my cricut!
customer_reviews.text: I finally splurged on this for myself and I'm not going to lie, I was a little intimidated. I was worried I wouldn't be able to work it. First off, it's not hard at all to figure out. There are also so many YouTube videos out there to help with anything you are a little unsure about. This is exactly what I needed for my business. It has made my life 100 times easier and the end result of my projects are so much better than I ever imagined. This thing is fast, and SO amazing. I don't know how I went this long without my Cricut!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Y

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for someone who hates cutting!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a graphic designer and not so great with scissors, so this machine is a lifesaver when I need to cut something out for a project. I love that I have the freedom to cut out whatever I create in Adobe Illustrator, but I can also choose from the huge amount of online Cricut content if need be. I really enjoy that it can connect via Bluetooth, so I don't have to trip all over wires and the slim design makes it easy to stow away in a closet when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I Finally Caved
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! I'd been curious about them for a while, and I finally caved and gave it to myself for Christmas. It's wonderful! I haven't tried cutting all the materials they say it can cut yet, but cardstock and felt have worked great and helped me produce items for my Etsy Shop in much less time. Highly recommended if you're a crafter!
customer_reviews.author: Kristian E. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok for the price. I got it for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Ok for the price. I got it for the writing function. Keep in mind you will need to get that adhesive backing refills too. If you put an envelope on it or some sort of paper it will curl the paper. So thin paper has problems. ALSO the software is all online. Truth be told I haven't messed around with a version that is offline (or if they even provide one), but if they don't that could be a flaw if you don't have an internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. EK

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the upgrade from the older cricut
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing...... It has taken a while to learn how to work all the,different parts but being able to cut my own images has been wonderful. The only thing that i missed understanding before buying it was that your personal images to be cut have to be printed out on your home printer and so far I can't get anything bigger than about 8x9 size. It is so much quieter and I have access to so many more fonts and graphics which is helpful. I love how easily portable it is too. So glad I made the decision to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Mushmom

customer_reviews.title: Grabbed this item and a good price. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed this item and a good price. Absolutely love it. It really appeals to my creativity and I enjoy using it every day. As a graphic artists it really helps me create a wide selection items, and works of art. It is especially valuable around the holidays. my daughter loves it too. I recently lost he ac adapter and software for this machine, I am hoping I can order it indepently again. I was thinking about getting the air 2 but am a girl on a budget right now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cricut! I used it a good bit. However, not ever 6 months old and it started vibrating loudly when it would cut. I took a break from it. When I went to plug it back up, it won't come back on and the power button flashes and the white light at the cutter flashes. It won't do anything else. I called customer service and they want to access the machine remotely through my computer. Not sure if that is regular practice, but that made me a little uneasy. Going to call back and see if I can have it sent in.
customer_reviews.author: livnxtreem

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall with the following caveat...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of cutting out designs for projects. I did not give 5 stars, because I had some difficulties at the beginning. The product was initially non-functional. I called customer service, who said it was probably a problem with the power cord. They said they would ship one out, but it never came. I emailed, but had no response. Finally, I just took the power cord from another machine, used it on this one, and it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: So far, it's great
customer_reviews.text: Day 1, AWESOME results from a newbie. The only issues so far are operator error, not machine. Initial cash outlay isn't low, and there CAN be a continuing drain on bank account, if I choose to subscribe for the designs available, but today I tested the software that comes with the Air...I made a couple simple designs, and cut them out on vinyl. Fantastic results, and not impossible to navigate the program, since I have watched several youtube videos the past few days, with instruction and tips. If my experience alters, I will be MORE than happy to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Tatooed Lady

customer_reviews.title: No need to buy cartridges!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product as always! I love that I can pull images from my computer without having to buy $20 cartridges. It does have a port for those who have cartridges even though this item does not require them like the older models did. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pixy

customer_reviews.title: WIFEY LOVE'S IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife for Christmas, she finally decided to give it a try, AND SHE IS LOVING IT!!! very easy to use with 1000's of free designs via Circuts website, doesn't seem to be Window's Phone friendly, still trying to work through that Bluetooth issue, but not real concerned with that part of it, she has it connected to her laptop via the provided cable, may try hooking up a Bluetooth dongle to her laptop, we will see
customer_reviews.author: Smootherworld

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cricut! I spent forever trying to decide and after finally buying it, I'm so glad I did. I have used this for party favors, greeting cards, science projects, gift wrapping decor and so much more. It is so easy to quickly design something and make a project extraordinary! I love that it's wireless, although I still have to be close to load the paper. If you're on the fence about getting one of these, just do it. Easy to use and so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, but the projects aren't quite as easy as they would seem.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product, but it takes time to do any project. Especially frustrating is peeling the vinyl away from small letters and designs. The Cricut software is also slow in responding. I'm sure it will probably get easier in time, but for now, I'm a bit underwhelmed. My daughter has an older version of the Cricut and absolutely loves hers. Therefore, I must assume I might be the problem, not the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy's Pop

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product. From day one it crashes (web based ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. From day one it crashes (web based Design Space) and takes 4-5 times of reload Design Space to actually cut a project. Bluetooth feature does not work well. Easy to plug it in and sit by your machine. Go for the Brother Scan and Cut. I so wish I would have returned this in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R.

customer_reviews.title: The best craft machine! So much better than older model!!
customer_reviews.text: There are endless things to make with this machine. A must have for any craft fanatic. Such a huge improvement over the original cricut!! I have been using it with an iPad but you can also use with a smartphone or computer. So much control with every aspect of the design now, the settings are also so much easier to use on this model. You are going to want to get the score tool and some extra markers they are available very reasonable on amazon of go to a craft store with their coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: It delivered very fast and everything in good shape. The machine is just far beyond amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my ever first Cricut from the US straight to Asia. It delivered very fast and everything in good shape. The machine is just far beyond amazing.. I am in love with it everyday. I am into making cardstock artwork. My child is benefiting so much from the wonders of the crafts. No regrets in buying this even the International shipping cost is so high. I hope this machine can last long!
customer_reviews.author: qoosmicah

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I'm an entrepreneur who specializes in ceramic wares, and this product has made my life SO much easier! Say goodbye to the days of hand drawing text and hoping that my paint markers wouldn't clog up or run out on me - or the days I spent hoping that the adhesive vinyl wouldn't come out looking sloppy and jagged. With a machine like this, I've not only reduced the amount of handling time I need between receiving an order and shipping out a product, but I've been able to create more uniformity within my products themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan White

customer_reviews.title: May be great once you learn how to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: The machine may be great once you get past the learning curve, but unless you have Facebook, there are no FORUMS, as they closed the one at Cricut down. For those that have never owned one, be warned, it is not open the box and start doing a lot until you watch lots of utubes. Very disappointed that an ACTUAL MANUAL did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: SRB

customer_reviews.title: Terrible software. Machine is insured but the cloud based ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible software. Machine is insured but the cloud based software is not. The software is very poorly designed and most of the time does not work!! Can't use the machine without the software. Tried on 5 different computers ranging in age. It would work 1 time with each computer and would not work again. Disappointing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: Would never buy this in a million years...wouldn't even take it for free...the app is worthless...it's incredible not user friendly and the machine itself is not worth the money the wireless capabilities with the app is worthless...save your money
customer_reviews.author: nicole mayer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Being new to working with this type of machine it did take me a little time to figure out how to work it. After playing around with it for a few days I finally got the hang of it and have made several nice projects. I' m really impressed with how my vinyl projects have turned out. They actually look like a professional made them. I plan on making several signs for my business with them. I'm still learning and will update my review when I have mastered it.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahomamommie

customer_reviews.title: I like the machine itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine itself, but the software is horrible!!! Every update is an exercise in frustration, and you can't just not do the update. It's next to impossible to design "to size", making it again an exercise in frustration trying to create your own designs. The cutting mats are too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: clare da loon

customer_reviews.title: Loving the use of it
customer_reviews.text: It is so great to have Bluetooth on it where I can sit on my laptop to create projects and exporting them to the Cricut. It came fast. Now I can sell my old one....
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Susan A. Morse

customer_reviews.title: I have wanted something like this for years but didn't want to be spending ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled! I have wanted something like this for years but didn't want to be spending money for any additional fonts or pictures. I have been completely successful using my own fonts, their free images and my images, as a brand new client. I can also look up ideas on youtube. My sister was here when I got mine and she wants one now too. She just wants to wait until she goes home so she is there when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a surprise gift and she just loves this machine. She has the expressions machine as well and says this model is head and shoulders superior to the older model. I like the fact that there's no more expensive cartridges to buy that most of the artwork goes unused. She can now buy just what she'll use and the patterns are like $1.00.
customer_reviews.author: Esoxfisherman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the cricut create so it was a little out dated and when I found out they had the cricut air I had to have it so when the price dropped I ordered and I love it. So easy to use. Still learning on how to use it but so far has been wonderful. I would recommend this machine. I was so excited once I received the cricut air. I have no complaints about this machine once so ever at the moment. So its a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a better product to do vinyl on. Only problem i have is VERY tiny letters - like 4 point font or periods that are small like head of a pencil, and I am still learning, but very user friends. Will sinc up to blue tooth computer or Ipad. does not work on webpage with any droid :( nor is there an app on Droid.
customer_reviews.author: ParentsOfK&R

customer_reviews.title: Great made for cutting vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Great made for cutting vinyl, I've made so many decals, cards, signs, tags, tshirts, and more from using this. I use it for my small business. I cut my info tags with it and make signs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Explore
customer_reviews.text: Love the Explore Air. Making projects is easy because it lets you know when to change mats and papers. If there's a layer that you don't want to use, you can just turn it off and it won't cut that particular image. The dial for paper selection makes it so much easier too than having to adjust the blade manually. I also have the Expression but this model does so much more. The software is not difficult to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Greco

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and easy set up but not many "free" images included
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine but wish there was a manual included rather than having to download and print myself. Easy to set up and operate. Unfortunately the blade that was included in my machine didn't cut precise and missed and made a mess of some designs but once I went out and purchased a new blade (wasn't that expensive but irritating that the first time use wasn't "new/sharp"). Wish you could sample of the cartridges or they showed you what exactly was in each cartridge as not many were "free" from Cricut.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love my cricut!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for years and still works like a charm. Love the idea of it being wireless (Bluetooth).
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!! I love my Cricut! The crafting possibilties are endless!! Setup was a breeze and it is very user friendly. This machine can cut very intricate cuts flawlessly. I got it at a great price when it was being offered as an "Amazon deal of the day".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - Not as easy as description states
customer_reviews.text: I've not used it yet. Still trying to figure out the software. I have been a photoshop user for years and I really wish I could just use PS for this, but you have to use cricuts software. The description states that you can upload your own images etc. to create projects. I have yet to find an easy way of doing this. I will update this once I figure out how to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is to design and create
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, the Cricut Explore Air makes decorating and organizing the classroom a breeze! I love how easy it is to design and create. The ability to do everything online opens up tons of possibilities. Occasionally the Design Space software will glitch on my Mac but overall I think it's a great product! It definitely beats using the old-fashioned di-cut machine at my school!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M.

customer_reviews.title: ... to write this review for awhile as I completely love this Cricut
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to write this review for awhile as I completely love this Cricut. This machine is very easy to use, I have used it with my laptop and ipad. The wireless connection has been flawless. The subscription is reasonable cost with endless amounts of graphics and fonts. If you own cartridges they are easy to link to this system. The cricut cuts perfect every time. Mostly I use cardstock and the images are cut perfectly. I did attempt fabric with little success, but I am still trying. This is the perfect addition to any scrapbooker, card maker. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money and a whole lot of frustration
customer_reviews.text: Advertised capability and occasional operation success are interesting, however we spend endless hours with support and software issues. Purchased cartridges disappear or become inaccessible on their site. If you chance this, suggest that you watch the return window with Amazon and unload this mess at the first sign of failure. Best advice I can offer.. Buy the Silhouette..
customer_reviews.author: texas craft queen

customer_reviews.title: Made adorable glasses that would have cost me $100+ on Etsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cricut to make wine glasses for a bachelorette party and other periodic projects. Made adorable glasses that would have cost me $100+ on Etsy. However, my husband soon discovered the cricut and what he likes to call "man crafting" and has spent every spare minute outside of work for the past month in our home office figuring out how to layer stickers, iron ons, etc. He's now discovered it can be used to cut stencils for powder-coating. I may never see him again! He has said more than once "why didn't you just buy the wine glasses so I could have my life back". Lol In other words, we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jjones

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I'm so glad I can upload my own imagines and it will print them. I have made so much already with this machine and can't wait to make more.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: First timer with a cricut! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My first time ever using a cricut and I love it! I wish I would gotten it sooner! Instructions are easy and machine is very easy to use! Shipping was right on time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Knocked a Star for the Pen
customer_reviews.text: I only knocked a start because the silver pen this comes with is out of ink and it did not come with a carrier bag like the cricut.com styles are advertised with. I'm mostly disappointed with the pen because those are about $5 on their own and was supposed to be used for the first project. Bit of a let-down. The machine works great otherwise. I'm excited about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! I made myself some decals for a water bottle to help make drinking fun & already have more people wanting them! The software isn't as difficult as people are saying it is as long as you're willing to sit down & learn it!
customer_reviews.author: Kami H

customer_reviews.title: Cash Saving Cricut
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected, and works great. Takes some getting used to, or a Cricut guru to get things started, but overall love this little machine, and am happy that I was able to order it on-line, bundled w/ tools for way cheaper than any local store price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the software/app is dang confusing... even for someone who is VERY tech savvy
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Latest and somewhat greatest.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for those who like using their computers to design. There are SOOOO many things you can do. I am struggling on how to size and layer things like the older cricut versions. The print and cut feature is great! For me, it's easier to use than the Silhouette. Just think I need more time to figure out how to use all the features
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

customer_reviews.title: i really love working with my cricut but have only touched to ...
customer_reviews.text: i am a novice to paper crafting with machines. i really love working with my cricut but have only touched to surface in the many projects one can make with this equipment. i look forward to having the time to view all the videos cricut emails me with project ideas and how-to instructions.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, I've been playing with it and watching tutorials non-stop. It's great to see so many non-paper projects like magnets, vinyl, faux wood and leather.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: She wanted one of these for a while now. I did a little research to find which one would suit her the best and found the Cricut Explore Air. The only downfall I have to say is its not as completely user friendly and "pocket" friendly as other models. We initially had a hard time with her mac and the cutter.
customer_reviews.author: yo

customer_reviews.title: Love my new toy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I got this on a Sunday. It arrived before promised and it made my whole day. It comes with a sample project that I made right away. I was so proud of myself. It's easy to use, but I should have purchased some other items to use my new toy. I had the cardstock paper. I was missing the spatula and glue to get started. Thankfully Amazon ships quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think Cricut must have like 1 tech support guy to handle all their cases
customer_reviews.text: What a pile of junk! This product never worked at all and I spent hours trying to get through to tech support to no avail. I think Cricut must have like 1 tech support guy to handle all their cases. No matter what we did, the red blinking light of death would come on. We tried with our iPad and a laptop and the darn thing just would not work. Most disappointing item I've ever ordered from Amazon. We sent it back, but unfortunately no one can refund us all the time and headache lost to trying to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: joshanders_84@yahoo.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine for hobby!
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine all the time. Its great. I even made some of my own lawn mower gaskets with it and saved a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, she loves it. The only quirk has been that if you use the web based software with the Microsoft Edge browser it is glitchy, use it with Chrome, no problem! It comes with instructions to connect it with Bluetooth to a tablet or iPad but I was able to connect it to our laptop as well and it works wireless just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aeroheadcww

customer_reviews.title: Cutting by hand is a waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to use this thing as much as I have. I find myself thinking up excuses to use it, which has led to some fun projects. The software is overly simplistic but it works well. If you're a creative person you will definitely benefit from picking up a Cricut cutting machine.
customer_reviews.author: Graviton Matrix

customer_reviews.title: I already had a cricut from a few years back but this one is just amazing and so automated
customer_reviews.text: Worth it's weight. I bought this instead of buying invitations and I have already gotten quite some use out of it in only two weeks. I already had a cricut from a few years back but this one is just amazing and so automated. I love the fact that I can meld images together in the design studio and that I can arrange them on the mat before I cut. I simply do not know how I would ever go back to the manual cricut esspressions if something were to happen to this one..
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This was a big investment for me and i was crashed that i couldn't even use it because it didn't read the registration marks (for the print and cut function). I searched for a lot of solutions and it seems that a lot of people had the same problem. Save yourself the trouble and buy a Silhouette.
customer_reviews.author: Yona

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box... The cutting mat is used, although I purchased a new machine. The pen had also been used. Since the mat had been used, the first project was a flop. The mat didn't contain enough adhesive for the cardstock to stick, so the machine jammed. Excitement completed thwarted by this. Had been looking forward to using my Cricut all week.
customer_reviews.author: caceewalker

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter has been cranking out out the arts & crafts projects like crazy with her new Cricut!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Cricut for our daughter's birthday. She is a arts and crafts nut and almost glowed when she saw the Cricut! She's been cranking out the projects like crazy ever since. Loves, loves, loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Barker

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that I did purchase this for her
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my teenage daughter. She had to talk me into getting this; she told me that she had seen reviews and videos for how to use it. I finally gave in and purchased it. Thankfully, after a few glitches, she got it to work and she is creating a lot of work with it. I'm glad that I did purchase this for her!
customer_reviews.author: SilverEclectic1

customer_reviews.title: ) I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to decide between this and another die cut machine I might suggest comparing the SOFTWARE :) I have never had so much trouble using software in my life. I sure hope they are improving it because it is infuriating. That is all. Otherwise (in spite of that?) I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: S. mclain

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cricut! It has allowed me to do so many projects! It has saved me so much money in all the party decorations I have done myself and I made my a shop on Etsy using it. Basically paid for itself. The iPad feature is so convenient. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine, and love that I can hook it up to my laptop or wirelessly to my iPad to cut custom designs! I wish that it came with a longer crulicut access trial period, but the preset designs are super inexpensive so I can't really complain about that.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cricut
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Cricut! I had an explore and it feels great to upgrade to an Explorer Air! I don't see much of a difference other than you can use it wireless, but it works great.I'm using this to sell Decals, T-shirts, and Coffee Mugs in my Etsy shop. Seems to be holding up well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cricut!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Cricut!!! Since I have had it I have made several shirts for myself and my children, I have decorated just about anything that I could get my hands on and I have so many more ideas I can use it for. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have literally cut 1000's of designs with this and it still works perfectly. I have changed the blades a few times
customer_reviews.author: Grayling H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and so handy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and so handy. The mats don't last long, and I constantly have to buy more. Also, some designs on Cricut are not free. Other than that it is amazing and definetly worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bloem

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I have been able to make cards ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have been able to make cards and packaging which is great. I would love to give it 5 stars but it does not completely cut through the card stock. I have calibrated and changed out the blades but it has to be on cardboard for it to completely cut through the regular card stock. If I leave it at the suggested setting of card stock you wind up tearing through the design to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P.

customer_reviews.title: Large learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: There is a large Learning curve. Really it's about the hardest thing I have ever had to learn how to use. Then after designing a project on my iPad it said some of the shapes in my project were not supported on the iPad. And had to go finish on my pc.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I use my cricut now as a side business. This little machine works magic!!! I have easily recouped the money I put into it and love my new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rockel

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This Cricut fulfilled all my expectations. Had a rough start trying to get my computer USB port to recognize the Cricut but after utilizing the support chat in about 10 minutes it was up and running. Love the accessories this bundle came with too. I would deinately recommend this product to anyone with or without a creative side.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in love with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this machine! The precision cutting is outstanding! All the tons of freebies on the design website is so much fun. I LOVE that you can download your cartridges right into your account! No need to keep switching cartridges anymore they are in your library.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had this item for more than 2 years and I still enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Jay08

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life changer. Great gift for any crafter or creative soul. SO many uses and possibilities
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this machine! The print and cut is the best! I would definitely recommend this machine to anyone. I just wish I could share my own files that I create in Design Space.
customer_reviews.author: Larra Vanden Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love, love my Cricut!! It was delivered quickly and is everything I ever wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Farmer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my girl loved it, and was cutting vinyl like a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: tony r.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I am able to do so many projects that I wanted to do but didn't want to spend a lot of money to pay for someone else to do.
customer_reviews.author: tkeziah

customer_reviews.title: I have received a few of her creations and nicely surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she uses it all the time. I have received a few of her creations and nicely surprised .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mullens

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought one sooner. OMG!!! I love this machine. I hope I don't get crazy with it. LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with service from circut
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with service from circut, can not access apt for iPad through iTunes Australia, and it is very difficult starting an account in USA. I feel like I am being passed on .... It's all to hard. Disappointing when the machine is great but being able to purchase goods is not possible for me.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN KELLY

customer_reviews.title: we are really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter in college, she took it out of the box did as directed by Cricut, it won't cut she emailed cricut they told her to buy a new blade for the new machine and let them know if it works. I have a cricut and never had these kind of issues, we are really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy. On the literature it states the pen and ...
customer_reviews.text: Box is missing the pen and the mat and I see no way to contact the seller. Now I have to spend additional money before I can even use it. I'm not happy. On the literature it states the pen and mat are included. Also did not receive a user manual, but was able to get a download from the Cricut website.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B Underwood

product_meta.title: Cricut Explore Air Wireless Cutting Machine
product_meta.description: Say goodbye to unnecessary cords and create more space to work on your projects. With the Cricut Design Space software system, send your projects wirelessly to the Cricut Explore Air machine for cutting.
feature_bullets: Dual carriage for cutting and writing or cutting and scoring in one step
Upload your own images for free (.svg, .jpg, .png, .bmp, .gif, .dxf) Cut over 60 materials from vellum to leather
Smart Set dial for easy material settings, Free Cricut Design Space online software and iPad app
Cut Smart precision cutting,Works with all Cricut cartridges
Embedded Bluetooth for wireless cutting, Dual carriage for cutting and writing or cutting and scoring in one step
Upload your own images for free (.svg, .jpg, .png, .bmp, .gif, .dxf), Cut over 60 materials from vellum to leather
Smart Set dial for easy material settings, Free Cricut Design Space online software and iPad app
Cut Smart precision cutting, Works with all Cricut cartridges

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,404 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
